page.title: 16A Childs Weekend
page.content: Almost every Saturday morning I go to the indoor swimming pool in Lowestoft. In the afternoon I go to my Nanna's and Grandad's and then on to my Grandma's and Grandad's. On Sunday morning I go to Sunday School where I am taught about Jesus and God. In the summer me and my family often go down to the beach at Lowestoft and we have a little swim in the sea. Then we go down to the amusements. I go on the toy rides and then I go on the penny machines. Then I go home to eat my tea. Sometimes for tea I have sandwiches with a cup of tea. After tea I clean my teeth, wash my face and then I go to bed.
